lexUnit.name: perceive.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: become aware or conscious of

sentence.text: Most of the older people interviewed perceived that they were in good health .
If parents perceive that the quality of education offered by a school is inadequate , they will move their children to another school by exercising choice through the mechanism of open enrolments .

According to Aristotle , perceiving an object is the result of being acted upon by it : objects of perception , acting via a medium of perception , causally affect the perceiver 's sensory apparatus .

WP Certainly , people respond to whether they perceive the world as threatening or reassuring .
